description: This is one of those spots that remains hidden even if it is mere steps to the road.  I didn't know what to expect as I set forth in a somewhat dense forest on the side of Henry Brook.  Well wouldn't you know there is a beautiful 25ft slider type fall just hidden!
directions: On the New Harbour-Lundy Rd in New Harbour.  Park ay stream crossing at N45.19405 W61.47622.   Pick the right hand side of the brook to go up...it's less dense!
title: Henry Brook Fall
